website_summaries.verdict: We understand buying the JBL On Stage for its unique look and its use as a charging dock, but there are options with better sound available.
pros: The JBL On Stage Micro III has the look of modern art and offers a practical, portable option for charging and listening to your iPod or iPhone
cons: A USB sync cable isn't included, and despite the JBL brand name, the On Stage sounds anemic for the price

customer_reviews.title: Full of nasty white corrosion!
customer_reviews.text: This product appeared fresh and clean but it didn’t work. Turned out that the battery compartment contained three dead batteries and more corrosion than I had ever seen. It looked disgusting. I fault the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sounding space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this almost 3 yrs ago. The sound is crisp and clear and I continue to use it off and on with no problems at all. It fills the room with my music at decent volume setting. This also charges my Apple devices. Unlike other users, this works with my iPod Nano 6th generation, iPod touch 4th generation, iPhone 4 and 4s. I was reading thru the reviews and was surprised to see I've not written about this wicked awesome dock so here I am to share my experience. This awesome little device is as exactly as described by JBL. I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: taks

customer_reviews.title: Uses AAA batteries, not AA. Product info wrong
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of iPOD speaker docks and this ranks right up there with the best. The styling and LED stage lighting are excellent. The wall-plug, battery, and USB powering options make it truly versatile. Remote doesn't always get detected by unit, but I haven't tried fresh batteries yet. Sound quality is unquestionably excellent, so the reviews stating poor sound quality either got a damaged/defective unit, or they are writing propaganda negative reviews for JBL's competitors. Be aware, the product info states it takes 4 AA batteries, which have a lot more mAh power than 4 AAA batteries and are cheaper per mAh. However, this unit indeed uses AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Rock'nRoll doctor

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: This unit and most JBL units sound amazing. I own several Ipods of the older persuasion. I didn't buy this for my Iphone 4s because it wasn't designed for that for its much older. I have that one troublesome ipod that when it dies it takes a jbl system to revive. I should probably give up on it but since I am currently in Afghanistan I will make due with the one I have.
customer_reviews.author: Keverick Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Only buy for iPod music
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be part of a baby monitor system. The baby monitor app mutes the sound until crying. Problem is the speaker goes to sleep when there isn't a sound signal. And for this app it won't wake up again. I tried it as a with my computer. But again I am missing system alert sounds and the start of all videos (until the speaker goes out of sleep mode). There is no way to disable power management. And this "Battery and energy conservation modes" text is hard to read as it is on top of a black image. Total waste of a good speaker.
customer_reviews.author: BlueBallTrotter

customer_reviews.title: A little flaky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so that I could play music from my iTouch and computer. There is an AUX-in that you could use to play from any device that has a headset port, but I just use the apple connector. I took away a star because the USB dock for this device is not very consistent. I noticed that there's a conflict between the USB port and the power supply charging the iTouch. I would only buy this if you plan to use it as a portable speaker. Don't buy it for the dock.
customer_reviews.author: getklow

customer_reviews.title: Great little product. Don't be fooled by its size.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can't believe the quality of sound coming out of this dock. Great sound fidelity. However set up took few minutes to figure out - there are few parts to locate and the packaging makes it hard to locate. But once you do it is a breeze. Definitely recommend for use in den, basements, home office etc - even living room!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: JBL Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dock to have on a nightstand. The weird design actually looks very modern and appealing in person. The iPhone can be docked in it at night without the illuminating white light on. The power button is on the back of the unit and the sound delivery is great for small rooms such as kitchens and bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik W

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Portable too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a JBL On Stage which had gone out. I am not disappointed at all. The old one was not the battery type and had 2 additional drivers, but this one sounds every bit as good and is portable too. I love this product and would recommend it to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: rhtiller

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: its Incredible for such a size of dock , it exceeds my expectations. price , size and quality just higher than i thought . its much much better sound than others in the same level of price and size.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: I read the mixed reviews on this and decided to chance it. It did not produce any sound at all. I tried 2 different Ipods, I phone 4, Iphone 4s and Iphone 5 with the adapter. NO SOUND! Sending back. True dissappointment as I wanted something portable and small for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Juengling

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker -- fantastic full sound
customer_reviews.text: We love this little speaker. It has a great sound for such a small footprint. It has the added benefit of both battery and plug in. We take it everywhere for our ipod and iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler742

customer_reviews.title: JBL really ?!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box didn't work. Very poor sound quality. One side speaker didn't work, base sound not existing if not JBL logo I would think this was made in somebody's basement.
customer_reviews.author: strongtie

customer_reviews.title: Good Loudspeaker
customer_reviews.text: This portable loudspeaker has clear full sound, easy move around and use anywhere inside or outside. Keeps iPhone/iPod charged while playing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Thayr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had this item but eventually the speaker went. After much shopping I bought this one. Other advertisers had them with the remote missing or there were scratces and so on but this one was perfect! I'm very very happy with this purchaae
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Shore Shopper

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: very very great excellent good stuff i love the sound the beat and the quality its very best stuff and its fit to my iphone and ipod,thanks i like it and i very love it guys,thanks
customer_reviews.author: George  Valeroso

customer_reviews.title: A good iphone companion
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good companion of iphone. The sound is good. But for people who like rock music, they might be a little disappointed that the bass sound is not that punchy. If most of the songs in your music library are classic or pop, it will be a good choice. The vocal sound is also quite pretty, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: jet

customer_reviews.title: Great size. The clarity of the music could be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size. The clarity of the music could be better. Speaker quality is good but not great. However, for the cost and the size, it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: They have great sound and very convenient as the size is smaller than the previous one that we purchased. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie58

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's perfect for what I wanted. I wanted it for work. I work in an environment where we can (and prefer to) listen to music. This is small, so easy to carry, easy to use, and the sound is good. It doesn't take up too much space and get in the way. Just set your iphone, on Pandora (or music you've entered into your phone, or other device) and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: brich

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speakers stopped working after three years, both from dock connector and jack.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good qulity, thanks i want to by something else here. shiping very fast. no troubles at all. nice to work with you
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Great item at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Item has been deliverd quickly, and as described. Great sound form a small speaker. I am really pleased with that purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F LaVoie

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with initial purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson. It had a problem ang quit working intermittently. After trying to keep it working for several weeks, he gave up and returned it for lik replacement at local Best Buy. The replacement has worked fine ever since. I understand he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J J from Irwin, PA

customer_reviews.title: Not good if turned up
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this speaker, but the first time it is turned up it will crack the speaker. The first one I received played one song and then it started sounding bad, crackling sound, and it did not matter at what volume it was set at. So I returned it and received a new one, well it worked just fine until the volume was turned up to a good level, now it sounds the same at the first one. So I will be returning it for a refund, so if you want a speaker that you can hear I would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very solid but not great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Based on user reviews, we picked this item up to give it a try and were initially very pleased with the build quality as well as the audio performance in our home with the ipod we use for our music. However, this lacked the necessary power/wattage to be used in a classroom setting where background noise might occur, so we've returned it and are currently shopping for something a bit more powerful. If your needs are primarily in-home without alternate sources of noise or in an office or other space where it's generally quiet then this will probably work great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, with one exception
customer_reviews.text: We own another set of JBL speakers, and we have been happy with the brand. I wanted some speakers that would charge my iphone while playing a white noise App or music at night. It sounds great but the very bright LED light on the unit makes it impossible to keep the unit powered on at night. Our simple solution was to switch the Mirco On Stage III with our other portable JBL speakers that we had in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this some weeks ago and no complains so far.. It functions pretty well, portable and we are happy with the choice. One small thing only and it is that the ON/OFF button located in the back is not extremely easy to reach and press, but probably it is just me. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JATB

customer_reviews.title: Great ro Have
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this speaker system!!! Excellent performance for the price. Recommended 100%. The sound is great, no distortion at all. The remote is really cool to operate and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos I.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is not the best
customer_reviews.text: The Portable Loudspeaker is beautiful but the sound is not the best because in very high notes generated a little disturbing noise
customer_reviews.author: ege

customer_reviews.title: i was expecting better sound
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better sound is enough to carry with you when I travel is not heavy and is not using to much space in my loggage
customer_reviews.author: cavanna maurizio

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The sound is louder and clear than what I was expecting for such a small device. The control remote it's really small but with a great range. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Santana

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: The sound is nice fills the room nicely the only problem is do not loose the remote if you do you will not be able to use the volume any more
customer_reviews.author: dario

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a year. Worked well during that year.
customer_reviews.author: mandilynn0804

customer_reviews.title: mono sounding
customer_reviews.text: This unit looks nice and easy to transport. Unfortunately, the sound quality leaves much to be desired. For those expecting Bose Wave Radio like results, move on by, nothing for you here. This unit produces monophonic like sound. My $20.00 Labtech PC speakers produce better sound. I guess it is fine for listening to spoken word / podcasts but don't expect to enjoy listening to Beethoven symphony 5 on it. Curious to know if this unit's big brother sounds any better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: na
customer_reviews.text: Very good and the sound quality too is as expected the price too is good But no aux cable provided in the box
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik Mukherjee

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I had this dock for less than a month. I used it maybe 10 times and never had the volume that high. Now it has terrible cracking sounds out of nowhere. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: kelseymolander

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little bit better
customer_reviews.text: Its design is perfect! Excellent instructions' manual, and the remote control makes the difference. The only thing that could be better is the sound power. Look, the power is good enough for open and close rooms, but we always want more :)
customer_reviews.author: FABIO DASSAN SANTOS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The stereo can play music very clearly and support iphone 4 and 4s greatly. It can also recharge the iphone.
customer_reviews.author: wilson

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: You won't believe the sound from these tiny speakers. Love the remote control. Use it for my ipod all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, but poor sound quality...doesn't meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Primary use for this device was listen to podcasts while traveling. For $100 I expected a substantial improvement over my $6 battery operated tin speaker traveling set [got it from a discount internet house]. Except for the beautiful and shiny design and the built-in I-pod charger [doesn't charge if on battery power], the sound quality is the same tinny, low depth result. I do not recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Henri P. Salle

customer_reviews.title: buen producto, buen precio
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price and exactly as described. So far I've only used with Power Adapter. works fine on my ipod nano 6th generation, but without some specific options menu. Sent to Colombia with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought a JBL donut speaker seven years ago (for less $) that has better sound quality than this model. The sound on the OnStage Micro III does NOT fill the room (even a small room) at all and the volume level does not reach nearly level of of the former model. Even with the Ipod insert the Ipod flops around and does not sync properly to provide sound-- you need to tinker with it to get it to work and then several minutes later it will lose its connection again. A miserable speaker and a waste of money. Disappointed and misled.
customer_reviews.author: Merck

customer_reviews.title: Cool thing
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was a present for me! Love the sound and design! Recommend it to anyone with Ipod! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Broken sound after played the ipod
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for my friend, I ordered this JBL On Stage Micro III before I leave USA for my friend in Thailand. My friend just told me that after he unpacked the Micro III, plug in the power and use his Ipod to play music on it. The item didn't work well, the speaker's sound broken. He tried to use different Iphone, MP3 player, the result was the same. I am not so sure about the warranty in Thailand will cover this Amazon's product or not because shipping back to USA should be the same cost as buying a new one. BR, Burachat
customer_reviews.author: Burachat Phinphirom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my desk at school. It provides great quality sound for quiet background music during student work times.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box as soon as I received it yesterday,and got my iphone on it.Wonderful sound,Delicate appearance Great great great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wangxin

customer_reviews.title: Love JBL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The design is really cool and the sound is incredible! The only complaint-it was a little smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ruedas

customer_reviews.title: charger/speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to charge my iphone and as a radio. Perfect, except it does not adapt to accommodate the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Poor Connectibility
customer_reviews.text: While I was able to connect these speakers to my old IPod Nano, I could not do it with any consistency with my IPod Touch which was the reason I bought this. The "adapters" that came with the kit were useless. I returned it using Amazon's easy return system.
customer_reviews.author: Grayray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it - just wish the volume was a little louder.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Yates

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and i love it. It has really good sound if you want to have a good music in the room. It works well for both Iphone and Ipod - it also charges them while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Eka

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete items inside the box
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package i was very excited. However that excitement changed to frustration when I opened the box and noticed that the AC adapter was not included. How am I supposed to use this product without an AC adapter?
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lim

customer_reviews.title: sounds good for it size and charges your iPhone at the ...
customer_reviews.text: sounds good for it size and charges your iPhone at the same time good feature is that it comes with a remote control
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G.

customer_reviews.title: Maximum audio volume is not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Maximum audio volume is not loud enough, is for small spaces. But it is very nice and convenient, is as shown in the video, only I thought the audio volume would be higher,
customer_reviews.author: Zu777

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: JBL On Stage Micro III Portable Loudspeaker for iPod and iPhone (Black) is great!i love it!!!!!! JBL On Stage Micro III Portable Loudspeaker for iPod and iPhone (Black) is great!i love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: qiaobangzhu

customer_reviews.title: Very amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfection on acoustics and constructions, you could enjoy it easily and highly. If you still do not use it to your Iphone, Iphone will lost fifty fun.
customer_reviews.author: rreellyy

customer_reviews.title: piece of poop
customer_reviews.text: Had for two days worked great the first day the next I turn on and turn it up it cuts off and still does to this day
customer_reviews.author: milman69

customer_reviews.title: Audiophiles Beware
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what you're used to listening to, some audiophiles and sound lovers with good ears may be disappointed by the quality of the sound generated by this unit. Maybe it just isn't possible to get a decent-sounding docking station for less than $150.00 or so. This is one instance where the JBL name on the product does not ensure excellence. Even at $79.00, this is barely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: topcat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item, it worked fine for a few days, then the sound quality went bad and it started randomly skipping to other songs. I exchanged it for another one and the second one did the same thing. Don't waste your time buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: TFab

customer_reviews.title: Earnest
customer_reviews.text: Item received in such a short time very pleased. Just what I need to travel with. Sound quality good based on size.
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER EARNEST

product_meta.title: JBL On Stage Micro III Portable Loudspeaker for iPod and iPhone (Black)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLet your favorite music take center stage in style, anywhere you and your friends get together. Battery operated and weighing in at less than a pound (0.45kg), the JBL On Stage* Micro III can go virtually anywhere. And with two JBL Odyssey full-range transducers and a digital amplifier, there are few rooms (or outdoor spaces, for that matter) it can’t fill with realistic JBL sound. Use a USB cable to sync and charge your iPod or iPhone with iTunes while keeping it charged, and navigate your library with the JBL On Stage Micro III’s IR remote control.




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


YOUR MUSIC ON THE GO
Let your favorite music take center stage in style, anywhere you and your friends get together. Battery operated and weighing in at less than a pound (0.45kg), the JBL On Stage®* Micro III can go virtually anywhere. And with two JBL®Odyssey® full-range transducers, there are few rooms (or outdoor spaces, for that matter) it can't flood with realistic JBL sound. Use a USB cable to sync and charge your iPod or iPhone with iTunes, and navigate your library with the JBL On Stage Micro III's IR remote control.

JBL has been bringing the sound of music and movies home for more than 60 years. THE SOUND OF MUSIC AND MOVIES FOR MORE THAN 60 YEARS
Been to a movie or a concert recently? There's a good chance that you were enjoying the show on JBL loudspeakers. If you've watched TV or downloaded your favorite song, what you listened to was more than likely recorded on JBL equipment. For more than 60 years, the JBL line has been the loudspeaker brand of choice for music and movie professionals around the world. They choose this brand because they can count on the brand's incredible sound quality to bring life to their latest music track or movie score. So why not enjoy music and movies from your iPod, iPhone or portable music device on a loudspeaker dock from the company that probably helped to mix and master them?



Advanced Odyssey transducers deliver audiophile sound quality Click here to View Larger SUPERIOR SOUND QUALITY
JBL ODYSSEY TRANSDUCERS
The JBL On Stage Micro III delivers superior sound quality through the use of four proprietary Odyssey transducers. The sound quality of these four drivers has been further improved with computer-optimized equalization, which tunes their output specifically for the JBL On Stage Micro III. These drivers are able to deliver incredible full-range sound (70Hz - 20kHz) because they are made of aluminum, which is the perfect driver material for wide dynamic range since it is incredibly rigid yet very lightweight. With the JBL On Stage Micro III, you'll be surprised by just how good a JBL loudspeaker dock can sound.

POWERFUL DIGITAL POWER AND DSP
The JBL On Stage Micro III features a powerfully tuned digital audio path. The clean digital amplification delivers high-output, crystal-clear sound.

COMPLETE COMPATIBILITY
With the JBL On Stage Micro III, you can use nearly any portable or desktop device.

IPOD- AND IPHONE-COMPATIBLE
Use your iPod or iPhone to listen to music, watch videos or check out your photos. It is compatible with all docking versions of the iPod, including the iPod nano G3, iPod classic and the iPod touch. The JBL On Stage Micro III is also compatible with all versions of the iPhone, including the recently released iPhone 4.0. And when using your iPhone with the JBL On Stage Micro III, you can still receive calls even while you're listening to music. The JBL On Stage Micro III will interrupt your music to let you take your call and then seamlessly go back to playing your tunes when you are done.

USB and auxilliary inputs allow you to connect the On Stage Micro III to nearly any portable device. Click here to View Larger USB INPUT
The JBL On Stage Micro III even has a USB input, allowing you to easily connect to iTunes to sync your latest favorite music to your iPod or iPhone - all without having to remove it from the dock.

AUXILLIARY INPUT
And with the included auxilliary input, you can also connect the JBL On Stage Micro III to a number of other "non-Apple" devices, such as other mobile phones, CD players, and desktop and laptop computers (all platforms).


DYNAMIC DESIGN
NEW JBL WEAVE DESIGN
Featuring the dynamic new Weave design, the JBL On Stage Micro III looks as good as it sounds: It's sculpted with swooping high-gloss pieces along with a dramatic see-through cradle that is backlit. You'll be sure to stand out from the crowd. 

SIMPLE TO USE
EASY TO USE CONTROLS
Just a touch of the brushed metal touch controls increases or decreases the volume.

The included wireless remote control gives you complete control of your iPod or iPhone WIRELESS IR REMOTE
Using the included IR remote control, you can browse iPod or iPhone songs, photos and playlists; change tracks and settings; and much more.

EVERCHARGE TOPOLOGY
When plugged into AC power, the JBL On Stage Micro III will charge your iPod or iPhone, even when it isn't connected to the computer or if the system is off. And when you want to take the JBL On Stage Micro III on the go, four AA batteries will give you up to 16 hours of playback.




HIGHLIGHTS


Dynamic new JBL Weave design Compact, lightweight and portable Battery-operated IR remote control navigates iPod and iPhone menus from up to 15 feet (4.6 meters) away Up to 16 hours of music playback from a fresh set of batteries Easy-to-use touch controls AC power supply charges iPod/iPhone devices USB input allows sync to iTunes Battery and energy conservation modes Status LED light 

Click here to View On Stage Micro III Product Sheet 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One JBL On Stage Micro III portable loudspeaker dock, one power supply, one mini cable, iPod/iPhone adapters




WHICH DOCK IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

Click here for the On Stage Micro II 
ON STAGE MICRO II
The On Stage Micro II delivers powerful JBL sound from the classic circular JBL design.




Click here for the On Stage IIIP ON STAGE IIIP
A bit larger than the On Stage Micro III, the JBL On Stage IIIP produces clear, powerful sound from a classic JBL design.



Click here for the On Time 200P ON TIME 200P
Looking to wake up to the sound of your iPod? Check out the On Time 200P which adds alarm clock and radio functionality to great JBL sound quality



Click here for the On Time Micro ON TIME MICRO
Looking to wake up to the sound of your iPod? The On Time Micro does it with style. The On Time Micro adds an alarm clock and radio functionality along with the ability to set seven independent alarms to the already great JBL sound quality of the On Stage Micro III.

Apple Compatibility for the On Stage Micro III: 

· iPhone: 4GS, 4G, 3GS, 3G, 1G 

· iPod: Classic 6th gen (video), 5th gen (video), iPod Touch (generations 1-4), iPod 4th gen (photo/color), 4th gen (click wheel), iPod nano 6th gen, iPod nano 5th gen (video camera), iPod nano 4th gen (video), iPod nano 3rd gen (video), iPod nano 2nd gen, iPod nano 1st gen
feature_bullets: AC or battery operated (batteries not included)
Dual JBL Odyssey transducers with computer-optimized equalization
IR remote control navigates iPod menus from 15 ft (4.6m) away
